last_episode_to_air.name: Trail of the Lonesome Mine
last_episode_to_air.overview: Crazy Legs is led on a wild goose chase to find the dragonfly's secret gold mine.

name: Crazylegs Crane
overview: Crazylegs Crane is a 16-episode made-for-television cartoon series produced by DePatieâ€“Freleng Enterprises in 1978 for The All New Pink Panther Show on ABC.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: In the cartoons that star Crazylegs Crane, he always goes through various misadventures, often accompanied by his son Crazylegs Crane Jr. and often deals with his frenemy, a fire-breathing dragonfly.

episodes.name: Crane Brained
episodes.overview: Crazy Legs Crane is shamed into going out and catching food for his young son but tries to catch a fire breathing dragonfly!

episodes.name: Life with Feather
episodes.overview: Crazylegs Jr. wants to be proud of his father, but his father can't do anything right.

episodes.name: King of the Swamp
episodes.overview: A tough and tall bird takes over Crazylegs' swamp and tries to get him out the way.

episodes.name: Winter Blunderland
episodes.overview: Crazy Legs Crane is freezing in the winter snow and ice, so he tries to find a hot meal with a fire breathing dragon fly.

episodes.name: Sonic Broom
episodes.overview: Crazy Legs and a witch fight over who gets to snatch the dragonfly.

episodes.name: Storky and Hatch
episodes.overview: Crazylegs Crane chases after a cue ball he thinks is a egg left on his nest.

episodes.name: Bug Off
episodes.overview: Crazylegs' conscience tries to teach him how to fly and get the dragonfly.

episodes.name: Animal Crack-Ups
episodes.overview: Crazylegs Crane promises his son a dragonfly, and the chase takes him to the local circus.

episodes.name: Fly by Knight
episodes.overview: Crazy Legs decides to enroll in knight school in order to impress his son.

episodes.name: Sneaker Snack
episodes.overview: Crazylegs is after the little dragonfly again, but this time he goes up against his old pal Crumley for it.

episodes.name: Barnacle Bird
episodes.overview: Crazylegs Crane has problems with a shark and a dog to get the dragonfly on a ship.

episodes.name: Jet Feathers
episodes.overview: Crazylegs Crane tries to fly again to pursue the dragonfly.

episodes.name: Beach Bummer
episodes.overview: It's a hot day, so Crazylegs Crane is trying to stay cool at the beach but doesn't want to pay a one dollar fee, so he tries to avoid a security dog.

episodes.name: Nest Quest
episodes.overview: Crazylegs wants to live in a house instead of his nest. He began to build one but he's really in for a mess of trouble.

episodes.name: Flower Power
episodes.overview: Crane is watering his garden flowers when a weed pulls out his precious flower.

episodes.name: Trail of the Lonesome Mine
episodes.overview: Crazy Legs is led on a wild goose chase to find the dragonfly's secret gold mine.

1.name: Season 1
1.overview: In the cartoons that star Crazylegs Crane, he always goes through various misadventures, often accompanied by his son Crazylegs Crane Jr. and often deals with his frenemy, a fire-breathing dragonfly.
